item.title: Telangana: Gadwal’s turncoat MLA ridiculed over clumsy attempts to evade disqualification
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana: Gadwal’s turncoat MLA ridiculed over clumsy attempts to evade disqualification
Fear of disqualification from Assembly can make MLAs do strange things. The Gadwal MLA who defected to Congress had lodged a police complaint against some people for adding his photo to flexis of Congress party in last February, but now he himself used Congress leaders in an X post
By Telangana Today Published Date - 26 February 2025, 05:16 PM
Gadwal MLA Krishna Mohan Reddy contradicts himself over his d...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
